alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns, north central Putnam and northeastern Clay Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Cove Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Picolata, Lakeside, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
